summary.para: The HTTP_503_RESPONSE_VERBOSITY enumeration defines the verbosity levels for a 503, service unavailable, error responses.
This structure must be used when setting or querying the on a request queue.

member.name: HTTP_503_RESPONSE_VERBOSITY.Http503ResponseVerbosityBasic
member.summary: A 503 response is not sent; the connection is reset. This is the default HTTP Server API behavior.

member.name: HTTP_503_RESPONSE_VERBOSITY.Http503ResponseVerbosityLimited
member.summary: The HTTP Server API sends a 503 response with a "Service Unavailable" reason phrase. The HTTP Server closes the TCP connection after sending the response, so the client has to re-connect.

member.name: HTTP_503_RESPONSE_VERBOSITY.Http503ResponseVerbosityFull
member.summary: The HTTP Server API sends a 503 response with a detailed reason phrase. The HTTP Server closes the TCP connection after sending the response, so the client has to re-connect.
